Html:
I've been following the Installation Guide (v3.5) and everything work well till the last part.

The last part of the guide told me to compile the Goblin XNA library, by opening the GoblinXNA.sln file under GoblinXNA\src and build the solution. 

So I Clean the Project GoblinXNA, but then 14 Warnings and 1 Error just appear.

Listed below are the error and warnings that I got.

Error: 
Unable to create directory "obj\Debug\". Access to the path 'obj\Debug\' is denied.

Warning:
The referenced component 'DirectX.Capture' could not be found.
The referenced component 'DShowNET' could not be found.
The referenced component 'Lidgren.Network' could not be found.
The referenced component 'Microsoft.Xna.Framework' could not be found.
The referenced component 'Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.Pipeline' could not be found.
The referenced component 'Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Game' could not be found.
The referenced component 'NewtonWrapper' could not be found.
The referenced component 'Nuclex.Fonts' could not be found.
The referenced component 'System' could not be found.
The referenced component 'System.Core' could not be found.
The referenced component 'System.Data' could not be found.
The referenced component 'System.Drawing' could not be found.
The referenced component 'System.Windows.Forms' could not be found.
The referenced component 'System.Xml' could not be found.
The referenced component 'DirectX.Capture' could not be found.

By the way I am using window7 

Thank you very much

You don't need to do "Clean". You should be able to compile without any errors if you have all of the dlls in under dlls/managed.

Ohan
